github_commits.author: Rahul Sharma
github_commits.message: Fix and remediation work initiated. Added composite index for query performance.
github_commits.lessons_learned: Learned that composite indexes can significantly improve query performance, especially for joins.
github_commits.bug_related: This commit directly addresses the identified performance bottleneck related to the 'Fix: Add composite index' issue.

slack_conversations.thread_title: Discussion about Fix and remediation - Query Speed!

messages.author: Rahul
messages.text: Yaar, Fix and remediation pe kaam karna hai.  Query speed toh badani hai!

messages.author: Priya
messages.text: Haan bhai, main dekh rahi hoon.  Let's focus on the most critical queries first.

messages.author: Amit
messages.text: Theek hai, let me check the code and the queries.  Dekhte hai kya problem hai.

messages.author: Neha
messages.text: Arrey, ye issue production mein aayega kya?  Should we test this thoroughly?

messages.author: Rahul
messages.text: Nahi yaar, testing mein catch kar lenge.  Let's do a full regression test after.

slack_conversations.key_decisions: Decided to prioritize the query optimization with the composite index.
slack_conversations.warnings: Warning:  Potential for performance degradation if the composite index is not implemented correctly.  Need thorough testing.
slack_conversations.bug_clues: The discussion highlights the core issue - slow query performance, directly related to the need for a composite index.

jira_tickets.title: Implement Fix and remediation - Query Optimization
jira_tickets.description: Implement the composite index to address the slow query performance issues identified in the production environment.  This includes schema changes and index creation.  Testing is crucial.
comments: Update 1:  Created the composite index in the database.
jira_tickets.bug_connection: This ticket directly addresses the 'Fix: Add composite index' bug, focusing on optimizing query performance.

confluence_docs.title: Documentation for Fix and remediation - Query Optimization
confluence_docs.content: This document outlines the steps taken to implement the composite index as a fix for the slow query performance issue.  It includes the rationale for using a composite index, the specific index definition, and post-implementation testing results.  Best practices for index design are also covered.
confluence_docs.author: Sneha Patel
best_practices: Always analyze query execution plans before creating indexes.
Consider the cardinality of the indexed columns.
common_mistakes: Over-indexing can negatively impact write performance.

google_docs.title: Sprint 6 Planning - Query Optimization & Indexing
google_docs.content: Meeting notes from the sprint planning session. We discussed the 'Fix: Add composite index' issue, the potential impact on performance, and the implementation plan. Action items assigned to ensure timely completion.
action_items: Rahul:  Finalize the composite index definition.
Arjun:  Create the index in the database.
decisions_made: Decided to use a composite index on columns A and B for improved query speed.
google_docs.bug_mentions: The discussion centered around the 'Fix: Add composite index' issue and its impact on query performance.
